s3nk3N1xLmhVFo93jeowUg.text: Gyros are the newest hottest growing trend right now. And this place is great!!! You can get either a wrap or a bowl. (Which is helpful because the wraps, 'while delicious' could not be messier to eat) the hummus is great. The proteins are not super authentic, but they are still DELICIOUS!!! And all the toppings and the sauces are incredible. Everything has its own unique flavor that adds a different layer of flavor. 1000% I WILL BE BACK!!! Good job!!!

L0_rnRbQXpCTfroUxzaSvA.text: First time here, and the customer service was great,  fresh selections and very tasty.  I found a new for my tummy.

YOv73MKj_GZPafk3dpBs4w.text: This place was amazing! The spicy hummus was in my veggie based bowl and the variety of toppings made each bowl personal. Definitely the new Mediterranean spot in Anthem area, go support your local businesses:)

OpDjP74w7bLJ_R3Xg4ax8g.text: Wife and I went there for lunch couple days ago.  Forgot to yelp it. This place is legit. Will be back for the tasty food and fantastic service. I know Mediterranean food as I am middle eastern and this food meet and exceeded from a taste and quality perspective!!! Thanks y'all for making our lunch a good experience see ya soon!

R6DtqK5SeV2CZEbhOabzoA.text: It is difficult to find, it is not facing the street. The menu is something like you would see at chipotle with the person standing behind the counter and they dip things into the bowl. There are no traditional drinks such as ice tea or soda. The staff are nice but this is not a place that will probably make it too long.

13Upfrvv0ufJSTiRlc3l8w.text: This place rules! The owner and his team are amazing. The food is fantastic and its such an original unique concept. You just have to try it. I LOVE this place!

SQ9zY5PEE5fu3nbmuMgbHw.text: First time here and the food is amazing. Everything is completely customizable. The employees could have been a little more helpful. I had mentioned it was my first time here and wasn't sure what certain items were. I kept having to ask what each item was. The seating was horrible. They have less than 10 tables and all were full. I will go back, but get it to go next time.

15833q3sGKvk3a5U_rS6_A.text: I hosted my book club here tonight.   Great place! The food is fresh, and the.service is friendly and fast.  I had spicy hummus, roasted veggies, rice, and a ton of toppings.  Huge portions! I could finish only half my bowl.

tE_RqQeWh4u93O822ydKQA.text: Stumbled on this place as we waited for some work on our car. We saw the sign on the centre's pillar and searched out the restaurant. It's hidden so not visible from the road. The lack of visibility is a shame because this has to be the best build your own concept we have found. We are both trying to eat healthier and this place certainly helps. Nice fresh food and we knew we had eaten with no processed after tastes which you get at other similar restaurants. You have to try this place trust me you will return and the value for money us excellent.

aNpJCPpn0lNsT9zRj5t09g.text: Discovered Hummus on yelp. This place looks really clean and the food was super tasty and affordable. I love all the option tl build your bowl or wrap. I will definitely come back!

fKRA1n-ngUIl9I8dmn5OpQ.text: A new fav for sure!!! Loving the concept of building a bowl with various hummus, meat, veggie and grain choices! I cannot wait to go back and try something else!! Good gluten free options and beyond for other allergies too!

BYphXg_xNb26kwA_qdWpoA.text: If you're looking for a quick and healthy meal, this is the place to be. My food was fresh and delicious with a good price point for the amount of food in an order. Not to forget the the black and white movies played in the common area which I loved. The owner or manager was pleasant with a great personality. Would recommend to anyone!

M9Xg48TcfGPLQbpIlReGKQ.text: Great Mediterranean salads in Henderson. Love their menu and is great value for money. We liked their unique juices as well.

hDiVAdbgdFQlej07Dgh5Qw.text: Place was just awesome. Came here blindly following GPS directions on my way to the airport - stopped in to get something to go, was unbelievably fast and delicious. All kinds of options, think I ended up with braised lamb and a lemon-zuke hummus over mixed greens and lentils. Are it at the airport and had people staring at it with pure, undisguised lust. Will absolutely come back.

tW2HGfQ1qUSwfg4bN2DMFg.text: This has to be one of the best restaurants I've been to in The Las Vegas area. Period. When it comes to ambiance, staff and taste, HUMMUS gets five stars all around. I love the fact that you can build your bowl as you go down the line. Jay was very polite and helpful with the building of our bowls, telling us what everything was and whether or not if it was vegan. I will definitely be back!

IDzIZVawWGDZsn-hUcOnwg.text: Love this place. Great healthy options for meat eaters and vegetarians alike. I get a salad bowl from here at least once a week and it's always amazing.

L0R3SEBRlDZfDX81cqmnRQ.text: Amazing food! Extremely well priced. Healthy food at a good price is hard to come by.

Ca66SWTIFc_EeK1S4Meu1g.text: Place had a great selection of fresh Mediterranean options! Also loved the drink options that were unique and healthy

XMuwMumjSY6ta-ITZkuDDA.text: There food is so good! Staff is very friendly. Have been here twice now and both times the food was great and staff was pretty helpful to a new comer here.

66xkL_IRdd_mksKZcmF7oA.text: Difficult to find healthy eats but this hidden gem is delicious!! Great spot for a quick bite. I had the bowl with zuchinni hummus, mixed greens, grilled chicken and topped it off with a variety of of veges. Yum! Too excited to eat to post a pic. This place is definitely worth a try. I'll be back for sure

iGbgqZEr1j032gDes1K58g.text: So far this is my favorite spot on this side of town when I want something quick and super tasty. You can either get a wrap or bowl. I tried both but I rather stick with the bowl. Less messy especially when you eat like the tasmanian devil.   I start out with a spicy hummus add arugula lentils and rice. Then for a protein I do the Crispy Hallouni Chesse. I do that instead of meat. Then add a variety of toppings and sauces that will make your taste buds go wild in a good way.  Staff if really down to earth and place is clean and chill. Try it out!! Keep it Tasty.

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States

2mUJD7JiWn-8iSf1faQp7w.text: This place was DELICIOUS! I would highly recommend it! The ingredients are both fresh and flavorful. The watermelon drink was very good too.

PHB82xmxaKn_bplv2Oj_SQ.text: This place has a great concept and I had absolutely no complaints with the food. There are so many options to customize your bowl and every ingredient tastes fresh and delicious. Like the "Chipotle of Mediterranean food," you get a bowl or wrap, choose your hummus, greens, grains, and meat, then add any toppings you want! Not only do they have so many flavors in each bowl, but also so many textures and colors. It's beautiful. Highly recommend checking this place out for a healthier and tastier alternative to fast food restaurants.

K4WRs3PZ5-kw50f8Q6nsOA.text: This place is unbelievably amazing! Easy to find parking, and you're greeted by kind staff and a warm atmosphere. The menu is easy to read, and the server allowed me to mix n match my proteins, veggies, etc. This helped because they have what seems to be unlimited veggies+ toppings, ALL DELICIOUS AND UNIQUE! It'll come to around $8-$10 and it was filling. Let me tell you that I lasted 8+ hours before eating another meal because I was so full

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States

xLZF6sWod3rkRe2NK_BpXg.text: This is the ultimate mock-up of Chipotle with a Mediterranean take to it, and I am a fan. The only thing that makes me upset about it is that it's not close to where I live. But for driving from southwest to Henderson, this restaurant did not disappoint.   First, you choose whether you want a bowl or a wrap. And we both chose a bowl, because why not? This is a make-your-own spot so it's great to play around with the ingredients.   I got the classic hummus with salad, white rice, beans, and lamb. My mistake was getting the tzatziki because they drench your bowl making it look unappetizing, but that was the least of my complaints. It was delicious, flavorful, and filling with all the individual ingredients that worked harmoniously well together.   The interior of this place was clean and modern which almost reminded me of a cafe rather than a restaurant. It's the perfect place to have lunch with good friends!   Now, the boiling question of the day: would I come back? Yes!

tHHMu9vhTO59PIcCIjSBWw.text: This is by far my most favorite Mediterranean food places. It's more of customizing your salad bowl by picking your choice of hummus, greens, protein (any kind of meat or falafel) followed by salad condiments area With great choices drinks.  The price was my only problem, just for one salad bowl and drink it comes to about $12 and some change, which is why I gave 4*.  Quick eat place for lunch break or hangout.

xOrJfg7COidCrKb_KK65OA.text: Food was what you would expect, decent and good. Ingredients were fresh but overall it was too wet for my taste. The flavors were good, just too wet. Loads of options. I give the food a 3.  Location was not convenient, had to make a special trip and nothing else around; I give it a 2.  Place was clean and pleasing to the eye; I give it a 4. The best aspect about this restaurant is the staff; I didn't catch the two men's names but they were very nice, personable, took the time time to explain everything to me and had great customer service. I give them each a 5.

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States
Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States

AHMTfJ7SN1juJNneCuJigg.text: Whenever I am in town I make sure to stop here. The food is so fresh & tasty. Kyle was so helpful and personable. Tried the spicy hummus bowl today...it was delicious! Also, love their no sugar added watermelon juice - it is so refreshing! Great place for healthy food!!

HU9c8586AHx4GjEKsiu30A.text: As a first timer, I ordered the vegan falafel bowl with extra Falafel balls and hollouism cheese (sp?) last night at around 7ish.  The Falafel balls were SO DARN HARD and super crispy. I couldn't eat the falafel balls or the whole bowl.  The sauce ordered didn't taste right to me. I have been to Egypt many times. I know what it tasted like.  The food that I had last night was super horrible. It costs me $17.00   dollars. MY EXPERIENCE WAS A HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT. The reviews from everyone sounds awesome.  It didn't work for me. Sorry!

QtFl5AVbCdLECpo0wuwDwA.text: This place is super yummy! A little pricey for lunch ($27 for two meals + fountain drinks), but huge portions of delicious and nutritious food! I've been on a Mediterranean food kick lately, and this place offers a selection of options I've not seen offered at most Mediterranean places in the area. Pomegranate seeds, beets, quinoa, and various unique sauces. All of it fresh, all of it delicious! This time I had classic hummus bowl with chicken and lentils and mint-tzatziki dressing, amongst many other toppings--delish! (I was too hungry and it was too tasty for me to take a pic.) Can't wait to go back and try a new combination next time!

7_aRamQvAnDkTyXZDtAGaw.text: So yummy! Every bowl I've had here has been so flavorful and just great overall.  Very nice customer service, very quick as well.  Prices are VERY fair considering how huge the bowl portions are.  No complaints, happy customer here!

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. Yummynesss!!!

eYI2J_8QKoLEZqhpnPmfyg.text: I'm going to have to go with 5 stars, as did many others. Love the healthy options, be it meat or vegetarian. Well priced. I got the pita wrap with halloumi cheese. First time trying that. Really good. You can add what you want. I had spicy hummus, rice, lentil, tomato, cucumber, baby spinach, halloumi, kalamata olives, quinoa, muhammara sauce (roasted red peppers & walnuts), roasted chickpeas, feta, tzatiki suace, pomegranate seeds, and sunflower seeds. The server helped me pick a couple of those. Very friendly staff. Trendy decor. Delicious food. Now if we could just get one of these in the NW valley. Highly recommend this place. I will be back.

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States

WEEH4y_E-_zI_uGjEZIRRQ.text: Really confused by these ratings. Individually everything I'm sure tastes great but with that many ingredients honestly it becomes one big mixture of food and you no longer taste individual taste of each item in the bowl. He first couple bites you can taste things but after a while it all tastes the same which is disappointing considering each topping probably tasted good on it's own. I'm probably just not a fan of this all you can top it with type of food. There are so many great choices here to add to your bowl. I absolutely love the concept and this is my favorite type of food as well so I thought what could go wrong? Customer service was great and he even asked how I liked the food afterwards.   Well what went wrong then? I was stuck in the bathroom for hours afterwards. I'm not sure if it was food poisoning or just ate something bad there, but either way I did not enjoy the feeling after eating there. Not good at all.   The 2 stars are for the concept and the customer service but minus a few stars for the toilet issue and the mixture of food.

ljuDH1IkbcwD0MO-1_UzHw.text: We stumbled on this place on accident, and we are extremely happy we did!!! Incredible twist on a hummus plate. It's like a burrito bowl gone Mediterranean with hummus!!! Amazing!!! Super fresh and VERY filling!!!

MvSXlC0zQrdZbuqOFrOS1Q.text: It is amazing. Very tasty. Love the eggplant hummus. Feels healthy. I've been going here 4-6 times a month now. Never a disappointment. The bowl is the best choice.

ANfU2UCisEOrlgW6ajv5Xg.text: I went here today for lunch and i was pleasantly suprised with this quaint hidden gem. I love mediterranean food, so this slight chipotle spin on a classic was clever. You have 2 options bowl or wrap. I'd pick bowl if your a tad hungrier. Hummus, greens, protein, and unlimited toppings made for a very hearty meal. It was my first meal of the day at noon and kept me full until 7pm! I also gave the cinnamon twist pita fries with peanut butter hummus a go and was impressed with flavor, just not so much texture. The pita fries where I expected them to be soft were hard. But overall i felt like this was a delightful meal satisfying and refreshing. Its far from where i live but i will definitely make the drive!

qSO7li_1vPWqiJkXs87JXA.text: Wow, to tell you the truth, I was kinda hesitant on trying this place because, I hate hummus and I've never been a fan of it. I mean, it's the name of the restaurant for God's sakes. So yes, definitely had second thoughts on trying this place out.   But wow, let me tell you. After my first bite of my custom made bowl with spicy hummus, I am now a fan of hummus lol.. this place is delicious! Their ingredients taste fresh, and the bold flavors with each bite .. yum! The 5 star reviews on this place.. much earned. Great place, affordable, and lots of food for your buck!  Try the pita fries dipped in their chili harissa sauce (nommmmmmm) and P.S. their garlic sauce is nommmmmm2x

SKb-7M9TlA_Qg16vAWOM-w.text: Came back and tried different toppings this time.  Glad they allow the option to do half rice and black lentils. Once again I went with the lamb. Consistent from the first time. As Najib promised, their market dip (bean free dip) changes. Today was spinach and sesame. Muhammara was great.  Harissa not as spicy as I've encountered at other places.  Whomever said the flavors just blend together needs to not come to such places because every flavor I chose comes through cleanly. From the citrus mint dressing, the tanginess of the pickles, the lamb, brined kalamta olives, roasted chick peas, etc. Once again, portion is huge! Love it.

ogTq6D4pHSkwBnYA_se3tw.text: Soooo good... the service is friendly, the food is fresh... it's the Mediterranean Chipotle... delicious!!

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. Halloumi Hash and Bowl

jNNBkmH3_RmlFWZ1MnKwjg.text: Stoked I found this spot in Henderson! Customizable bowls & wraps w/ ALL the fixings! Fresh. Flavorful. Healthy. Generous portions. Friendly service. Delicious! My fav toppings are seasoned tomatoes, feta salad, pomegranate seeds, pickled onions, and I highly recommend adding their *seasoned crispy chickpeas* to whatever you order. And of course, the garlic sauce just takes it to the next level. Huge fan!

_oBE_PdS9uoGyJ0O5rpcxw.text: I went here based on the reviews and pictures. The food is so good!!! I got a bowl that is probably three meals for me & trust me I can eat a lot! I'm sure someone who eats really small meals can get more meals out of it. You pick your hummus first then your leafy greens. After that, you can pick a meat with roasted veggies if you like. Then they have a whole bunch of toppings. It was my first time & a gentlemen helped me. I think he is the owner. He is very personable & explained to me everything. He was awesome. All this under 10 bucks. I'm on a mission to eat more healthy & this place is definitely fit for that. Thank you Hummus & I will be back again.

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. Delicious

z2KOZR0EKEHuWA2hqHKxyQ.text: I ordered delivery. Food tasted great and was fresh. It was packaged well and presentable when delivered. It was a nice touch that my delivery bag was decorated with a chalk marker with my name on it. As silly as that sounds it was a seal of quality with great calligraphy. Back to the food, it tasted great. So many add ins available at no cost to make your own individualized pita. The garlic sauce is a must and I will be returning for the freshness and quality of food, presentation, packaging, and that house garlic sauce.

Gik06STKrE91Q9G0vymCaw.text: Amazingly delicious. Fresh food with great flavors! Went here on a whim and so glad that I did. Love all options that they have. Go there!!!!

yydQ8wT5u0GzDGtxGvdkkQ.text: Never had this type of food before but it was super good and I also told my friends on Facebook to check it out and told a friend by text we should go.

sxADRx7NyWQDCq6oHSJ83A.text: The food here is absolutely the best, healthy and refreshingly delicious. I enjoyed it very much and will be back for more.

m0DXXWeGoecF3N4nTqr5Yw.text: I absolutely love this place! Huge portions on their bowl that my girlfriend and I share for only 10 dollars. Food tastes amazing, light, and healthy. We come here quite often and don't mind the car drive. Staff as well are friendly and inviting. I highly recommend this place!

P3y2wJxf8OVLbBofsobRoQ.text: All of the five star reviews on here are not without merit.   I had the spicy shredded beef bowl, which was perfectly flavored.   All of the toppings were also tasty and fresh.   The selection of fountain drinks was also on point.   Definitely a must.

sinKEkKS8JKPBJlUA1CJdQ.text: I could eat here everyday. Delicious. I'm truly hoping this is the future of fast food. I've been here four times everything is always fresh. A great place to pick up a healthy lunch.

aYdxVW6CsYnpUyP6EOwp7w.text: hUMMUS offers fast and fresh food. Healthy options and great taste. Nice atmosphere as well.

0J_8UDruvM1KX_oTc5JL2g.text: Fresh, healthy, delicious, and reasonably priced. I haven't had a bad meal here, but my favorite thus far is a pita with spicy hummus, braised lamb, tabouleh, pomegranate seeds, and jalapeno sauce. Their craft drinks are incredible, and the service is always top notch! I never feel gross after a meal, because the ingredients are fresh and nutritious, but all the spices make the meal interesting every time. I've been there a dozen times and have always had a wonderful experience. Just writing this review is making me hungry for it! Just eat here! Your tongue and tummy will thank you for it!

aS9x-6FuajcibNyFUL_hVw.text: This place always has fresh food,  chill atmosphere, and clean overall. Good amount of choices (protein choices too) to place over your delicious hummus and top it off with whatever they have there that always taste fresh. I always visit this place every time I come down from Los Angeles. The staff is always friendly and courteous. I'm happy to find a good delicious meal and I dont have to pay "luxury" dollars for in the Vegas/Henderson area. Yummy!!!

XfG0DziVwcE2joDZ25BaZw.text: So yummy!!! Great prices and so fresh. Just what we need on south Eastern. Besides the build your own bowl we tried the falafel and loved that too! Definitely will be back soon  The place is kinda hidden in the back but well worth finding

AmmHxuvs0VH7ruSeYgKHyw.text: I am so happy that we finally came here to eat. The food tastes amazing and fresh.  My husband and I both opted for the bowls..next time we will have to try the wrap. There are plenty of options to choose from to build an amazing meal. This is a great idea. I was happy  to see that they offer vegan and gluten free options. The sugar free beverages were refreshing too.  We will be returning and would definitely recommend!

e9BBq40w0h_f0bWfL1fMFA.text: Incredible food... going since day one! Always a great and healthy meat, awesome drinks, and friendly staff! Where is the salted Carmel hummus though?!??! Can't wait to come in again and again...

IYbr7TIuiG3FiXmSPlVZPQ.text: We love this place. Awesome healthy food at a good price. Do not go here, because I do not want to wait in line behind you

Yd4hZBq6Gk0iR8SGbBeuCA.text: Wow - We read all of the great Yelp reviews and had to give this place a shot.  It SURPASSED expectations....It is AMAZING!  Everything is sooo fresh - You build your own hummus bowl, starting with hummus and greens and then add any of about 30 different toppings.  I have been there 5 or 6 times since first trying it 3 weeks ago and have never waited more than 5 minutes for my food.  How great is that?  Hummus will now be a weekly part of my dining plans.

dVc4nzBTKynBVLJWgn97cQ.text: Second time here. I love the bowl, spicy hummus and all the topings. Food is so fresh. Hits the spot after a workout or a long day.

CbySSor-8n9kc6txJ5k5GA.text: I finally had the time to come check out Hummus and they took my tastebuds on a very enjoyable ride. I had a bowl with mini pitas since they ran out of big wraps. Kudos to the staff for being able to make alterations on the spot. Another reviewer compared Hummus to Chipotle and I totally agree with that. The ordering style is very similar. I'm crazy about Mediterranean food. Some of the highlights of my bowl were the garlic sauce and of course, tahini. Hummus has filled a void (literally) in my stomach. I can't wait to go back.

A-2sXKURfoDkQBpzDHMnuA.text: Great place! I wish they had one closer to me, I'd go multiple times a week.  I got a bowl with hummus and arugula topped with veggies, chicken and more.   I recommend trying the different sauces, cheeses, spice options.   This place is a tasty and healthy option for those looking for something fresh, low carb or vegetarian.   Drinks were good too, drank the house cucumber mix.   Nice and chill ambiance, with scattered tables.   I will be back. Until then I will cross my fingers that they open one on the west side or even north summerlin.

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States

DutX27kAKj1V2SyOtIzqqA.text: Finally tried this place! I have been driving past it for months, as I live right by it. Used to be a coffee shop I believe?  So, my husband isn't in to this kind of "healthy" stuff, like at all. I drug him here anyway. They have steak, so he was happy.   I ordered a bowl. I will try to remember all of my ingredients! I got the eggplant hummus, romaine and spinach, black lentils, roasted mixed veggies, about 15 toppings, and the herb tahini dressing on the top. My toppings included tomatoes, cucumbers, apple slaw, quinoa, feta cheese, sunflower seeds, and beets. I'm sure there was more!   We also got the pita chips, and got to sample their new peanut butter desert hummus. Yum!  Almost forgot, I got the pineapple cream soda.... tastes like desert :)  I will def be back! Not sure about my husband, but my 3 year not only loved her side of rice, but loved the music and was dancing all over the place. We can do mommy daughter dates!

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. Eggplant hummus bowl, with tons of toppings! So good!

mapUg0zDrYfbqJPhSrhLFA.text: I have been wanting to try this place for a while now, I work across the street.   I finally decided to walk across the street and pick up lunch.  I got a build your own bowl with babaganoush, spinach, arugula, and chard, rice,lentils, chicken, and a mixture of sauteed vegetables garlic butter, tzatziki sauce.  It was enough for two people and it was so good.  I will be walking there again soon to pickup lunch again.

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States

wLk19ZehicpkJlB8dC1LVg.text: Fresh, amazing Mediterranean food reminiscent of the time I spent in both Jordan and Israel. Portions are super generous for the bowls, service is wonderful and the toppings are numerous and delicious.  I literally cannot stop talking about how great this place is, and I wish I lived back in Vegas because I would go all the time.  Also- you can add roasted veggies to any bowl without having to pay extra!

xNPpvLz2WxJPgFqN6IDfEw.text: Great service and healthy eat! Staff gave us a quick introduction of the menu. Good to hear that everything is made fresh and non-GMO, and some items are vegan. I got the spicy hummus, half rice half lentils, half steaks half roasted veggies, and various toppings. I could not finish my bowl. Portion is huge, and it is fulfilling. I was not impressed with the steaks (a bit chewy and was bland), but it went well with everything else. The roasted veggies option (to replace protein) was delicious. That and the halved cherry tomato topping were the highlights.  Good for lunch and dinner. I feel full, but not stuffed or gross out.

AVH7FYft1r5Z8TA5U85paA.text: This is by far the best Mediterranean spot in town. All their ingredients are incredibly fresh and the prices are reasonable too. Also the best falafel I have had in town. Staff is super friendly too. Try it. You will love it!!

TOEpjOr1PTPGu9KP99fpiw.text: Thank the lord that he gave me the best gift,taste buds.While your enjoying your epicures allow this to be great on any menu.

eSO4itu8xtgUiXnD8MiSEg.text: This place is very good.  It is close to authentic middle eastern food as you can get in Las Vegas NV.  I have been to Israel and this come very close to the real deal.  The flavors are amazing and also so good.

EKb6pG5YZJglesQXH3vZIQ.text: Love, love, lovvvve! This review is long overdue. Hummus has become my favorite lunch spot over the past few months; seriously, my co-worker and I are obsessed! Even with an exceptionally wide variety-- I haven't had a single meal here that has been anything short of amazing!   You have the option between a bowl or a wrap then you kinda just customize it to your liking; choice of meat, veggies, rice, etc.   This place is extremely vegan friendly :-)   The restaurant is incredibly aesthetic-- and most importantly, very clean!   Service is quick and the employees are kind and great at giving suggestions.   10/10 would recommend!

NhI-3oekUEXl2uSB6cPYsA.text: The food was really good and the serving size is very generous, two people could probably eat from one bowl.

413NPfIRrjzC57mh1kWyxQ.text: I came here during lunch and I liked the affordable price and fast service. This is a build your own bowl kinda place which I appreciate the opportunity to choose from multiple veggies and meat options.   I chose the bowl with the classic hummus. Since I am not a picky eater I basically selected pretty much all the options on my bowl. I also chose the lamb and about three very flavorful sauces.  I really enjoyed my meal especially knowing that I was eating something healthy. After finishing I felt satisfied...not overly full. I really liked how well the food felt in my system.   The only thing I was not a fan of was how soggy the bottom of my bowl felt with the hummus. It was a tasty flavor but not the best texture.   If I am ever in the area I would def stop here again. Thank you for your time and service!

nMBPbhg_s12yZRDhmZiK0A.text: Food was absolutely delicious.  Their lemonade was tasty. A little pricey but worth it.

y7OiZigAdOZWPvAcs0y_ZQ.text: Soo good! Everything is always super fresh and tasty. There is a ton of different options for you to customize your meal. The staff is always super nice.

uQulrbNA3sPngGne3e3NmQ.text: I can't believe I'm actually doing this, but I'm giving out a 5 Star Review! I hardly ever do this so y'all better check this place out because it is LEGIT! This is basically a Mediterranean style Chipotle where you can pick various ingredients in either a bowl or pita form. You get to pick things like the hummus flavor, the greens, the grains, the protein, a various assortment of toppings (like tomatoes, cilantro, pomegranate seeds, feta cheese, and etc.), and you finish it off with the sauce.  I ended up ordering a bowl with the spicy hummus which is apparently their most popular flavor and it isn't even spicy hehe along with the beef. Although the appearance leaves a lot to be desired, there is just so much flavor packed into each bite! After the first bite I knew that I just had to write this review because of how good the food is and how I want y'all to check this place out ASAP. The portion is a good deal too! I'm actually surprised I got such a big bowl with a bunch of ingredients for less than $10 and we all know how pricy Mediterranean food can be!    The workers here are super helpful and nice as well. The guy who helped me was very enthusiastic and had a bunch of recommendations since I was a bit overwhelmed and indecisive lol. He even offered to put more ingredients that he thought would complement my choices which meant a lot to me because most places just want to get you in and out.   Overall I would definitely come back here again despite it being a bit far for me. The location is a bit hard to find at first so make sure to have your GPS on. Apparently all their ingredients are fresh and wholesome as well. I really can't think of anything negative because my whole experience was just so positive.

E7RD3DRU9LSMtKIIXBI5Jg.text: The food here was amazing! I tried the roasted veggie and falafel in a bowl with garlic dressing. IT WAS AMAZING. I will be coming back to try more. The atmosphere is really chill and calm. They have music playing with a projection screen on the back wall. They were super busy with what looked like a delivery or to go order and they were out of some hummus, so they gave me a free drink for my "trouble" which was really no trouble at all they also have peanut butter hummus with cinnamon sticks for dessert. The soft drinks are cane sugar, so even the soda is better here. SO good. I forgot to take pictures of my bowl before I ate it

7l2TayHXJRCRgWI9ZvoXQw.text: The people who work here are not very friendly when I entered and asked about the concept. After I received my bowl. I sat down to eat it. It was decent overall.   I was watching the girl make other people's bowl and I was a little grossed out by her plastic gloves that only protect her and not the consumer. On several occasions, she would pull out her dirty germy phone from her dirty back pocket and text while wearing the gloves in between making people's bowl or wrap. Everyone knows how germy cell phones are. Then I would watch grab the different items with her contaminated hands. The type of food here is prone to harmful bacteria if not careful. I hope I don't see this place on Dirty Dining. I don't think this behavior is ServSafe approved for food handling.

e2CJNpu9xitU1jEpdFnVng.text: I've seen this place several times when I drop off my daughter to preschool and finally tried it tonight--so glad I did!! I got a hummus bowl and it was sooo delicious!! The ingredients are very high quality, the portions are generous and the staff was very friendly. I got a hummus bowl with spicy hummus, spinach, chicken, cucumber, roasted red peppers, feta, tzatziki and cilantro. So healthy and I couldn't put my fork down! Great value for the price, I think my bowl was $8 and it was very filling. I will frequent this place often and have recommended it to friends!

N39_SxVS-OWM4ULkZfmLEQ.text: You know when you love a place so much that you can't wait to tell everyone about it? Hummus is that place for me! Healthy meets delicious served fast and at a reasonable price.  To start you pick between a bowl and a pita. Then the options include several types of hummus, various greens, protein options, rice, lentils, vegetables, cheese, olives, sauces, and spreads. The combinations seem almost unlimited. Drink options are interesting with specialty sodas and juices. Everything seemed very fresh and we were told the restaurant makes everything daily.   My bowl definitely tasted fresh and delicious. I went with spicy hummus and loved it mixed with the other flavors in the bowl. The chicken was nicely charred from the grill, but still moist. The garlic sauce was yummy as well as the mint tzatziki. My husband loved his pita and he isn't the type to touch healthy food normally. Both options included more than enough food.  The inside of the restaurant is simple and clean. It's pleasant for a quick and casual option. Staff was friendly and quick to explain how everything worked when we walked in.

Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. Bowl

MHHYmp0IwTMFSWpLGbvG0g.text: This was my first visit to Hummus restaurant the food is amazing. I'm often in this area and I will make sure this will be my go to lunch place. If you were in this area or just looking for a healthy alternative with plenty of options make Hummus your next place to visit .

WOmpuIdZ-CpCTdTAZTD2rg.text: It's difficult to find healthy food when visiting family in Henderson. The food and service are equally great! I wish we had a place like this in our neighborhood!

gXrYSC7nAYLnOv6zGJ1j5A.text: We are locals here (part of the year here, part elsewhere).  We eat out every single day. We recognize that the restaurant business is a difficult and tricky business to achieve success in. We eat in divey out of the way places and in high end restaurants (think Hank's in GVR).  It is with this in mind we write reviews.  HUMMUS is terrific.  It is a small place, a little tricky to find, that offers excellent flavor varieties of hummus and middle eastern food.  It is set up similar to a Chipotle in that you choose your hummus base, your greens, your rice or black beans, your protein which consists of beef, chicken, lamb, grilled vegetables and other choices, your sauces and enjoy it in a large bowl or wrap configuration.   It is outstanding! Healthy, vegan and gluten free options if you prefer.   The flavors are magnificent, the ingredients fresh, the serving size is ample and a value for the price.  They also have unique soft drink flavors.  This is not your run-of-the-mill middle eastern restaurant.   It is very casual and comfortable.  Old movies play on the wall while you eat which is fun.  Love this place.  Great tastes, fresh and healthy choices, excellent value.  It is worth searching out.  In a sea of restaurants, HUMMUS stands out as an excellent choice that we can heartily commend to you.

fPTycwz2wJGnZAdqbRPxRg.text: This "new" restaurant is such a great little place.  You get delicious food in a bowl that can serve up to 2 people and still be full.  I'm new here myself so having found this healthy spot I am really happy.  I look forward to showing up again whenever I'm schlepping over to the Henderson area.  It definitely is a place to try out and enjoy if you're ever in the Vegas area.  Henderson is just down the strip and this place is quite the find.

kLmLXOU7RNfA1vorie6dAg.text: This place is AMAZING! Glad my partner and I gave it a shot. The restaurant is super clean, the guy behind the counter was super friendly and everything was so fresh and delicious! Also super affordable!

blhcFl2IRTTMXZmuaeYsxg.text: I came here to bolster the facts, the truth about this place. There is nothing else like it around. You can't beat the flavors, the quality, the quantity, the prices, or the friendliness of the staff... anywhere. This partially hidden gem won't be hidden for long. And for god's sake, try the lamb.

dyPSLxjO8ONh4g1yBfDCuA.text: Came here with my family. The prices are high for the small portion sizes. The flavor profile was off. The food looked thrown together. Not at all what we were expecting.  But their desserts were amazing.  My wife is not a fan of sweets and she really enjoyed them too!

7taImhwA_1Z6nT2N70KsFw.text: Best described as a Chipotle or Subway with Mediterranean food.  Very inexpensive, but food quality is outstanding.  Everything was fresh and tasted as it should.  Nothing was left out on "display" for too long.  The associates working were very friendly (Feb 7, around 9 PM) and engaged with us.  Location is modern and bright.  Lots of floor to ceiling windows to make it very open and exposed.  You won't find Coca-Cola or Pepsi here.  They use a different company (which I cannot remember the name now), but has a great selection like root beer, cream sodas, fruit-flavors.

f1RXdHzpejOgpOu8cJTZMA.text: I came here on Friday night, it had good reviews first time here. I'm looking forward to eating here there's a place like this in Charlotte called CAVA, I got a bowl the black lentils are not cooked below standard, I ask about the protein and tried the chicken I tell the worker wow that chicken is really dry and not tender she says well it's the end of the night so that's what happens, I looked at her and said chicken is not suppose to be dry the way it was, I asked to try the steak not good at all I'm talking over cooked steak also dry, I finally try the lamb and it's full of salt I said your leaving me with no choice here. I told them you guys really need to re-evaluates how this is cooked and prepped and she just said we do things differently. How can the place in Charlotte North Carolina same food same protein same vegetables be so bad and awful in Las Vegas. Keep in mind that was 40 minutes before closing, I call today and tell them I want my money back I have my receipt is was terrible they said ok come in, so I go in there and was explaining to them how bad the food was and they say we don't get complaints like this so I said here I'll tell you what just instead of refunding my money just make me a new Bowl and That way I give it another chance they we can't do that then changes their mind and says ok what do you want same what I got last time, the girl making it monitors how much the portion was and would take some out and put some back on the spoon and I was come on this is ridiculous, got the chicken got black lentils and veggies and I ask for the sauce and she drench the bowl completely once I opened my bowl up it was so drench in sauce it became a texture of soup!! This place is awful and I would not ever attempt to eat here again shame on you Hummus your food is below average!! If you want to monitor the portions use a scale and stop being so nitty!! I like greens and proteins, protein house, Purple Potato but this place has to go!! Don't waste your money because it's literally a waste of a restaurant in this area and please for the sake of foodies don't fall for the pictures!! Hire a new cook, hire a new staff because one of the worst customer service experiences ever!! I'll let you guys ponder after this..

UU1VtiSqbaL65JyqFZSlJA.text: Excellent little spot.  The food is fresh healthy and amazing.   Hard to find as Its in back of the mall but well worth the search. I could eat hear everyday. Staff is friendly and store is super clean.

rs-cGX7MX3jIs2Bcmv2YMQ.text: Easy to find and park. Loved the ambiance of the interior and the available seats outside. Had the wrap. It was so huge you couldn't "wrap" it. Lots of topping options. iHEC_9BDI0d54c4vQvu1vA.text: Mere words don't express how delicious my hummus salad/bowl was. Let's just say the entire bag of food didn't make it on the car ride home. I had to dig in! CyQA8yse7OLhuCgRt0t81Q.text: This is my second order, and I need something to distract me from not eating their food at this very instant. o6unz5rRHAdEzneLTIodDg.text: Tried this place for the first time with my husband, who is usually a meat and potatoes kind of guy and he loved it. Whether it's a bowl or pita, they served you a generous amount of meat or roasted vegetables. The setup is like Subway, and relatively the same price. One of their bowls is enough to last me for 2 meals (mind you I've had gastric surgery & I share some with my daughter ).

rzcFRQ3bX-nXsxzXWnURyA.text: If flavors could speak they'd have been shouting. The food is delicious and not your typical gyro meats on bread that you find in many casual eateries. Like Chipotle, the menu is simple; pick hummus base then meat if you want, beans, rice pomegranate and leafy veggies. What you end up with is a bowl of flavor so good you'd be had pressed to leave any at the end of your meal. Of course I should mention that the staff are friendly and can easily recommend ingredients to those who are new as I was. They also have 3 unique drinks to choose from or standard fountain flavors. I stumbled upon this restaurant on my lunch break after a rough morning at work. I left glad to have stopped in.

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. Refreshing different Mediterranean offerings than the usual gyros

ULSAJxiGz269Ih0A-pKWvQ.text: Update: Still love this place but I have to mention this... one of the guys serving food on Sunday 4/8 is doing so with Apple Air Pods in his ears. I also LOVE my Air Pods but come on you are serving customers! Wake up call, owners. This does not send a good message to customers.   Got dinner here tonight for the first time and was absolutely blown away! I'm a huge fan of the fast casual build-your-own concepts and this one doesn't disappoint. Flavors were amazing and there was a ride range of toppings to keep it interesting. The concept of the brand and a menu tour were done to perfection by the guy up front.  Some suggestions to make it even better: 1) Find a way to label the toppings. Some were obvious what they were, but most it was hard to tell. I felt guilty asking about each one. I can imagine that it could potentially hold up the line when the restaurant is very busy. 2) Add something SPICY. The Spicy Hummus and Harissa weren't kicking enough for me.  I'll be back TOMORROW!

SKzUg2po2b1rU2-ctPen7Q.text: One of my fav lunch spots . It's so unique & the menu is simple . My favorite is the chicken hummus bowl...You choose your protein , greens , & toppings & the type of hummus you want , & sauce . & it's not too expensive , they also have a tasty watermelon mockjito with no sugar but it's soooooo delicious .

Y5__bK2bzgTKSdkHi0DAxg.text: Came here yesterday with a couple of friends, we wanted to try a place we haven't been to before and we stumbled upon Hummus. The moment you walk through the door you are greeted by amazing smells and really friendly staff. You could actually tell they enjoyed working there and you don't see that very often. Everything about this place was delicious even the fountain drinks tasted way better then everyone else's. They even had lovely flavored water and juice. We will definitely be eating here again.

ob3BWQmGEByKi71a_aRm3w.text: I'm way too lazy to Yelp usually but this place is too delicious to not give a shout out to. I've tried just about everything here and it's all tasty af. ESB3Itn4NVOGi4t85U8xcw.text: This place was ahhhhmazing. It's like a BYO Mediterranean spot. I got a bowl with chicken, lentils, hummus, garlic sauce (ask them to go light on it it's very powerful), crispy chickpeas, and arugula. They also carry healthier sodas and non added sugar teas and mock(tails)! This place is far from my house since it is close to Anthem. I loved their coca-cola they had! The other sodas tasted a bit weird.  It's in a very awkward spot so the GPS took me to a different strip mall. The facility is very clean, the staff are very nice and patient as well. I had so many questions and they didn't mind me at all :) overall amazing prices, high quality food, and nice staff. I will be back if I'm in the Henderson/Anthem area!

z7kCz2-uHL_uDXMvCpnxBQ.text: This place is bomb! Food is yummy and fresh! Great vegan options. My friends really enjoyed  the lamb, chicken and beef. llPyjQsq_sjTZv7cvMBiFw.text: Amazing healthy food. Friendly staff and some of the best hummus and Mediterranean fusion I've had in Vegas. Must try !

hNvwEQb_xE4E8hwklRZU5g.text: On the rare occasion I make the drive all the way over here, I always want to check out new places to eat, so I saw this one and saw what good reviews it had. At first I thought it was a more dine in place, but it's kind of like chipotle but Mediterranean style. I got the chicken bowl with hummus veggies and the spicy sauce they have. It was really good, and they also had sugar free drinks which were tasty as well. The chicken was alright, I'd probably skip that next time and just stick to the veggies. Cool concept good food and service was good too.

m6USvaRMkIdhzjgaSm-pwA.text: Drake (non-vegan): I had a hummus bowl with some grilled chicken in it. I can't remember the exact options I put into my bowl but everything was delicious. Ally (vegan): Love the concept of this place - you choose to order a wrap or a bowl, pick your greens, pick your hummus, your protein and veggie add-ins. I ordered a hummus bowl with spinach, classic hummus, and honestly all the vegan options! So filling and fresh, I think you really get your money's worth.   Good location and nice service! The only odd thing was that there was little seating available, but it seemed like they had the space for more. Otherwise, it's a clean and simple restaurant that we will definitely visit again for its delicious Mediterranean food.

VfWKK5aShNp0wB6gSH6ZXQ.text: I would first off like to say the food here was mediocre and not all that the reviews are caught up to be. While I was sitting and eating my food, I over heard who I believe to be the manager, or whoever was in charge not entirely sure, getting upset at their employee, it went as far as the person in charge verbally degrading this employee. I did not see the employee doing anything wrong while working. I will no longer be coming to this establishment because I will not support and give money to a company, that does not respect the work their employees put in nor appreciate that work. I strongly suggest next time you feel the need to reprimand an employee you do so in the office, not in front of your guests. Honestly, if I had not already ordered, I would've just walked back out.

gAK2b03fwp7PTiixyMt0kQ.text: Phoenix native here, and on a recent trip to Vegas, tried out Hummus! It was delicious! I loved the ability to pick my own toppings and create my own bowl. The mint tzatziki sauce is amazing. And the dessert peanut butter hummus with cinnamon pita fries were the best part of the meal. Get em!

EaovOP2vyX2UABDc-Vl7Cg.text: I live nearby and have been wanting to go for months.   Finally stopped in yesterday and had a spicy hummus bowl with baby arugula, herbed rice, lentils, baked falafel, pomegranate seeds, cucumber, tomatoes, topped cilantro, crispy roasted chickpeas, and mint tzatziki.   Tori answered all questions knowledgeably and with so much grace and patience. (She is a star!)  I even went back today to order the same thing. So delicious, very filling, and it's food you can feel good about eating.

K4flC2kfVVHQNVzOsIPUlw.text: I wanted to like this spot! I reallly wanted to!   Friday morning after a night of obliteration in the town, I wanted to eat something fresh and healthy. Naturally I opened up my handy dandy yelp bookmarks to find a new spot to try! Came across hummus! Was amped about going for Mediterranean as I love the spices that Mediterranean food consists of.   This joint is another chipotle for Mediterranean food! You pick your base, your toppings, your meat, your sauce etc! I came for a salad and got hardly any salad. My bowl was thoroughly and unequivocally wet from the hummus they spread around the bowl. Mind you, it wasn't wet from dressing! I got the dressing on the side! I was dying for something healthy, light, and refreshing!   Unfortunately for me, the wetness ruined my entire bowl! Wasn't for me! Maybe the next time, if I return, I'll probably do the hummus on the side???  I didn't even end up finishing my bowl, not even half way before I couldn't do the wetness anymore.   Advice: get the hummus on the side!!   They do play old school films on the projector on the wall though. Super cool touch!

xL30uK1P4MTSCTm9m_-8Ig.text: One of the best Mediterranean restaurants in Vegas! I've been countless times and have never had any issues with my food. Everything is always right on point!

BApQhXX8rR4WZpWgr8SOpA.text: I barely write reviews and it's not like this place needs any help in achieving 5 stars BUT I have to let the people know what's up. It's rare that I come across a restaurant that CONSISTENTLY delivers. The quality, the flavor, and the service each deserve a paragraph of its own but I'll keep it short since the crazy amount of 5 stars already speaks for itself.   I will say that almost every time I've stopped by for a bite, Ashley is working the shift and never fails to warmly greet and help me with my order. She's very attentive to my dietary needs and answers any questions I have with such genuine enthusiasm - it's evident she wants you to be satisfied with your experience. If that's not amazing customer service, I don't know what is!

Kpm0mjR8OyLkVjAVh4hiWw.text: This place is like the chipotle of mediteranean food! And i mean that in a good way. They pretty much make everything in house which is awesome and you can tell from the taste and quality. I always get a bowl and stick with spicy hummus with arugala and steak. I like the different choices of toppings you get. And love the garlic sauce and crispy chickpeas!! I dont like that they raised the prices from when they first opened which is why j dont go here as often anymore. Nevertheless, this place is a must try!

kUxBvwG-rgsQysnynGkIDA.text: This place is one of our new favorites, the food is fresh and so good. They have a bunch of great toppings for the bowls, and the price is great for what you get.

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. Lamb hummus bowls

fAIHLZQSCw0i4h8ft7fbpw.text: If I could rate this place 6/5 I would. It is seriously freaking amazing!! Think of chipotle, but Mediterranean style with super fresh and delicious ingredients.  I came on a Saturday for lunch with some friends. The location is a bit hidden in a strip mall, but the interior is super cute. You have the option between a bowl or pita, choice of hummus, choice of greens, rice, lentils, and tons of delicious toppings and sauces. I personally recommend the garlic sauce and spicy hummus.  For this most recent visit I went with a bowl including spicy hummus, romaine, rice, roasted vegetables, olives, cucumber, tomatoes, and garlic sauce. The portion was huge and it's vegetarian friendly. What's not to love?!  The only sad part about this place is how far away it is from me, ugh! Please I'm begging you to open a location in Summerlin or the west side!!

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. My vegetarian bowl creation

sTp1D8xFgGHbvJ0HftFsBw.text: Ahhhhhh  Hummus reminds me of the Bay Area sooo much.  Fast and casual with a hipster vibe and high quality healthy ingredients.  What else can a girl ask for?   Order your food at the counter and choose which toppings you like, the braised lamb, grilled vegetables, jalapeno hummus, and muhumarra flavors were out of this world delicious.   They important their tahini directly from Lebanon and it is clear they take serious pride in the quality of their food.  Vegan falafel available.  Vegetarian friendly.   Indoor seating.   Beware the shopping center is a pain to get into and out of depending on where you are coming from and trying to go but it is seriously worth it.  I wish Henderson had a salad bar concept like hummus.

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States
Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States
Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States

PvOqLp7MjMSzud3xlWU8Rg.text: Decided to take a little drive to Henderson for some Hummus. As per all the previous reviews, it's pretty standard that you'll get a pretty tasty and filling bowl every time you come here. They offer both bowls and wraps along with other appetizers. It's not a very big menu, but you'll most likely enjoy everything on it! We ordered two bowls with the steak and the Bird's Eye Chili beef (January special) with babaganouch for the base and of course all all the fresh fixin's. The beef is super tender and tasty and my favorite dressings/toppings are the garlic paste, Spicy Harissa, classic tzatziki, and the crispy garbanzo beans. Also decided to try the Halloumi Hash, which was a little skimpy in my opinion in that it came with very little of anything but the cheese. It did, however, have good flavor but came with too little of anything for me to order it again. They also have very healthy and flavorful drink options which are quite refreshing. It's only too bad that they don't have one in the Southwest, otherwise I'd be coming here more often!

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States
Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States

mLN9waSUfVlynsu18RJpWw.text: This place is great for a healthy lunch option. You start by picking a hummus bowl or pita. I chose hummus bowl: with kale, spinach, lamb,veggie toppings, topped with taziki dressing. If you like falafel, this place has a really delicious one. Their portions are large and can easily make 2 meals. Their flavored sodas are really yummy and they also have sugar free natrual juice (with free refills). The dinning area is small, but the bowl can easily be made Togo, they have lids at the end of the counter. If you are on a special diet or health conscious, this place is a great option.

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. Hummus bowl with lamb and veggies.

rIvvvEvkdwUbFTglmPyKpw.text: *update* The owner actually listened to our review, changed the beef so it is more tender and invited us back. They even added a shredded beef option which reminds me of Mexican Birria, for those that are familiar. Both were great! I've never seen a restaurant listen to their customers and adapt this quickly to make things better and earn their business. This place is a must try! It is both delicious and a healthy choice which is hard to find. I invited my coworker this time  and he loved it. Will definitely be coming back over and over.

Healthy, clean, tasty variety  As self professed foodies, hubby and I always ask each other, 'Is this a repeat' and, Yes, it is! * See you soon, @hummusbowls , thank you for the great spin on eating hummus!  Your constant companion,  ~deirdra

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. Hummus is life!

47fULGeYVj3IxNjNhjEzMw.text: What's not to love.  Really impressed with their selection of fresh ingredients. When I first came one of the trays was empty but after I asked if there was any more greens, the employee pointed out owners who were in the back in the process of cutting up more greens. Yes! I liked that, especially it was late evening already, and I was not getting something that's been sitting there all day. They have choice of lentils or herb rice. Love the sauces. My go-to is the "house fave" Garlic sauce.  The employee was really helpful and offered to let me try all of them before I decided. Thank you!!   Customize your bowl or wrap. The DIY process is easy as 123. Just read and follow the directions people. You cant go wrong. All the veggies and sauces complement each other.  TIP: the more colorful, the more delicious, not only visually appealing but tastier too.  Love also how they remodeled the space with a more fresh and modern look. The projection screen is pretty cool touch.   Prices are reasonable enough for having your daily lunch fix here.  The space the current restaurant is in has gone over many turnovers through the years, I have a feeling though this place will be here to stay for a while!

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. Black Lentils for my custom bowl today.

JaSmqb3scM0e0yrz0bAX5Q.text: Update- I tried their desserts.  The cinnamon fries and chocolate peanut butter hummus... and it was, BOMB!  The food here is very very good.  It's worth paying more for the amounts you want.  No complaints on the quality and flavor of the food it's sooooo great!!   Old review: Very good.  I would give 5 stars if They didn't skimp a little on the meat.  It's honestly a joke how little meat was added to my bowl, I could finish it in three bites and I'm not exaggerating. The second time I came back, I ordered extra meat now and pay more just to have a normal serving of meat.  But the quality and flavors are definitely a delight. The staff is friendly.  There's a nice atmosphere.

3w2T8GYOzfl-RG5dCI0AKQ.text: omg I've been waiting for a place like this to open up here in town. Mediterranean food chipotle style where you can build your own bowl, get a pita wrap, or both haha. On top of all that everything is made in house and fresh, they don't own any freezers!!  I got the bowl filled with spicy hummus and mixed the chicken and veggies. Then added spinach, rice, black lentils that gave a nice texture, pickled onions, tomatoes, cucumber, kalamata olives, Tabbouleh, and topped it off with garlic sauce and another dressing. I like my toppings what can I say. Food was super delicious and pretty filling.   The girl behind the counter was also very helpful giving me some tips and letting me sample the different hummus they had to offer. The owner was a stand up guy too, he talked about how he wanted to share the food he grew up with. And he even added a free drink for me since they had some fresh drinks they make in house too. I got the currant and thyme and omg I'm so glad he gave me that free drink haha.   Overall great service and great food 5/5!! I actually called the store to let them know they're doing a great job and their product is quality. Wishing them luck and I'll be back again soon

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. This picture doesn&#39;t do the food justice. I was too excited to eat haha

mtgXyBPcMs5CqyS0IAI76g.text: I was intrigued with the buzz this place was getting and when I looked them up on here they had 5 stars so I had to see for myself why! I went with a bowl, spiced hummus, arugula and they're crazy amount of fresh toppings is what really took the cake for me! The set up of it reminds me of chipotle set up when you're ordering they have lots of fresh finely chopped veggies, crunchy chickpeas, pomegranate seeds, garlic sauce and so much more!!! I will be returning for more. If they switched their beef to grass fed that would be awesome.  But to end on a good note they are worth the hype!

p_e96xSNUJMpKN2dHtDFJw.text: I was wowed by this place! I walked in without any expectations and waaala ;-) I may be a bit bias because Mediterranean is one of my most favorite cuisines.   I was immediately impressed by how fresh everything was. I ordered a bowl with regular hummus, chicken, rice, lentils, pickled onions, tomatoes, cucumbers, quinoa...and a few other fresh items with garlic sauce. I had no idea how it would turn out or what veggies would taste well with what...but, I was truly amazed!!! Only reason I took one star off because chicken was a little dry.   The resturant was very clean and the staff was friendly. They give you free taste test as well.   I really enjoyed it!! Especially since I'm trying to eat healthy and stay away from processed foods.

TNUbOKYuAENy4ZPvzfVgRA.text: To start I am not that crazy about hummus, but this place really impressed me ! I had a wrap that had  baba ganoush instead of humus as the spread. I picked beef for my meat and loaded on tons of their delicious toppings. They had some sort of shredded apple topping and it was so good. I have recommend this place to several friends already and everyone loves it!

WOgsC_hX1DkraT9RYi2XKw.text: I was in Henderson for a doctor's appointment. I was looking for a healthy place to eat afterwards and found this place on Yelp. It is hands down the BEST meal I've had in a super long time! I seriously can't believe this restaurant isn't available all over the United States! I am so sad there is only one and that they are so far from my house. I seriously need one of these closer to me. The world should not be deprived of this deliciousness! The recipes for each item are so fresh and so full of flavor!  I went with the roasted veggie hummus bowl with a variety of lettuce and a combo of rice and black lentils. I got to pick several other toppings to go with my bowl. All recipes are his family recipes and are so very yummy! I really hope they start opening this restaurant up everywhere because it's a True hidden gem!

xNfhdy-GEkw0p-ko5pFMTw.text: Drove by this place for weeks and my regular Mediterranean place was closed...best thing that could have happened.  Awesome food, great atmosphere, extremely friendly and helpful  employees.  The braised lamb was AWESOME!...(my mouth started watering again)  Must try!!

y9ytVwwsuZ_vJFqQxHapCA.text: Food was really great. Tasty and fresh. My reason for the 3 star rating was for the customer service. There isn't any. It was my family's first time at Hummus and we explained this to the person at the front counter. No explanation of selecting from the menu or even welcoming us.

UfdnkN8j2coiLU11CyDpsg.text: Wish there were 6 stars we could give. Fresh mediteranian food. Counter staff super helpful. Got the hummus bowl. Super flavorful and healthy too. Coming back soon and often. Not visible from eastern. Worth the hunt located at rear of building.

_GAWbORos0M9dZasLWj8sQ.text: Looks like a new favorite in the neighborhood, healthy, all organic and DELICIOUS!!! I told them to make me up something and whatever they put together was the bomb!! 4 different types of hummus for the base of your bowl, like 5 different kinds of greens, 3 different proteins and toppings galore! I'll definitely be coming back!!

6jrrzhowptxFH40wlU7mcA.text: WOW, you guys nailed it!   It's so difficult to find legit, quality food on the run and I'm so happy to see a business catering to fast healthy food, THANK YOU!   My bowl: spicy hummus, chicken, spinach, black lentil beans, tabouli, cherry tomatoes, extra kalamata olives and mint tzatziki sauce. So much goodness.  Food is wonderful, the staff is super friendly and the ambiance is unique and comfortable. All around, a great job, I will be frequently Hummus :)

xuhpTPurcj5gKOb-wEw53A.text: This place is the real deal! Authentic Middle Eastern Homemade, the owner stole his Mom's receipies! Smart Guy! Service is also Grade A, they will guide you through the process to make your personalized gourmet feast! Make sure you try one of their exotic fresh beverages. I had the watermelon mock jito! Most refreshing. Try this place for a wonderful healthy meal, great to witch it up!

NA9vEl9iOFquOsHxa1476w.text: This is the best Mediterranean food I've had in Las Vegas. The 5 stars is no joke. I recommend getting a bowl to get all of the different toppings they have. Also, the lamb is amazing!

OU1i-MDUzG68_JbW-3bTuw.text: So yummy! The meat and veggies were fresh and the girl at the counter was super helpful at explaining what everything was. Great place to grab a quick and healthy lunch

5VbYGpx6uu3qUl9teSaa-w.text: Loved it! This will be my go to place. Ordered a chicken bowl. Lots a toppings to choose from. Loved their sauces. Healthy and tasty.

0wJ65EIpnKx6LKgkFRhGow.text: This food was amazing! So colorful, tasteful, and unique. I love Mediterranean food anyway, but this had all kinds of topping to create your very own. PVPaPjYv0TYtkov4cB62QQ.text: Based on the greeting we received from the super friendly owner, Najib, the whole vibe of the place and freshness of the food, we will be supporting this neighborhood spot! Very cool and bowl options are like nothing I have ever seen!!  The freshly made (by Najib's sister) fruit drink infusions are BOMB!  Wow, we met everyone tonight, the owner and the chef! I hope and wish that everyone up the hill and down the hill will support HUMMUS. Come try, you will have no regrets if what you crave is fresh, healthy and made with love. Btw, there are no take out menus (in an effort to go paperless) so you will need to come inside. It's behind Bell's BBQ and Pho Mailan. Yay they have also decided to stay open until 10, something we desperately need in the neighborhood! Wonderful food, unique but simple concept--imo the way eating should be. Make HUMMUS your Go-To Bowl spot and you will not be sorry!  Yep ate there last night and going back today. I never do that!

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. I usually have water but could not resist and Najib kindly offered drinks on the house!
Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. Oh the toppings delight, sauces are to die for and I am not a sauce person.
Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. Not many tables but bet that will change. Grab your compostable bowl and head home.

g5BM92AKx1gimFWPgpPmkw.text: Delicious vegan falafel wraps.  There's a lot of vegan options and the owner was really nice. Definitely coming back. Recommend to all vegans. They also have GF options.

fvb_4ZZ0kNvYBP-ohdFJmQ.text: We we're in a rush and yelp came to the rescue we saw this was almost 5 stars and pictures looked amazing. It is hidden in a back building with a lot of parking at night, not so much during the day. I love that they are a already cooked and build your own type of meal. They had so many healthy options to chose from. The thing I liked the most about HUMMUS is their mix ins and options of sauces. The best part of the meal was their pita chips, it's like nothing I've ever tasted. I always crave the pita chips, it pairs so well with their bowls. We try to come every other Sunday because it is that GOOD.

zZYDNfc6CuEcJRfTW1IK7Q.text: Food was fresh and delicious! The staff couldn't have cared less about service or customers needs. Felt like we were an imposition to counter staff while trying to order. Too bad.

e8jPBy2Pi29EX1r8TEhKtQ.text: A favorite!  So fast and easy, yet totally delicious and refreshing.  They are a "create your own bowl/wrap" type of place with tons of toppings to choose from.  It's nice that you can choose what you want, or don't want, and try to make things a bit healthier if you are counting calories/carbs.  Everything I tried here is fantastic and fresh!  I love the garlic sauce (better plan to skip date night), it's intense!  There is usually a little bit of a line when I go (weekday lunch time), but it moves quickly.  Staff is friendly and the decor is cute.

AgEn0RcoCiu0Wag7L-GMZQ.text: We were in town for a family funeral and were in need of some veggie options for afterwards. These folks hooked us up big time.  We were looking for a platter or something with an assortment of dishes.  What we got was a mega mezze extravaganza.  I can't remember names, but the guy in charge said he wanted to make sure we had enough for everyone.  The food was fantastic and certainly overshadowed the standard deli platters that were also there. I don't get to Henderson that often, but I will be sure to stop in again next time I'm in town

63_mGC_qL24vPFnT_-cL1g.text: I came in earlier this week for the first time and came back for a second time today! Let me tell ya Ive added this place to my list and I can guarantee frequent visits from this guy!   It's a build your own wrap/bowl concept so the the possibilities are endless, however all the food taste fresh and all the flavors and seasonings are spot on. You can tell the business really cares about the product they put out! Great job Hummus keep it up!

6_QUsbNpTNnxOvZBlTE5qQ.text: Ive come to this restaurant 3 times now, and Tyler has served me every time. I love the service provided and food. I get the chicken and halloumi in my bowls and it is the best. I'm definitely brings friends to try this place.

Fci7dLtTGtFQR6VJ6gTiCw.text: Some people talk about a hidden gem. This is really really hidden. This restaurant is located on the backside of the parking lot that it shares with Lee's Liquor and Egg Works. Even knowing its there, it is still easy to just drive by. I guess the silver lining to that location is that there is little problem finding parking. When we walked in, we were greeted by three very friendly staff. Hearing we were first timers, we got an intro mini-speech about the restaurant. The big take home is everything is super fresh - no freezer here. You place your order at the counter "Chipotle-style". First decision - bowl or wrap. Then which hummus to go with. I went spicy (yes, it is very spicy for the Gringo palate). Then pick a green, then a protein (chicken, beef, lamb, vegan, cheese or veggie). Then you add in the toppings - way too many to list here. Finally, choose a sauce. I went with the herb tahini. When I go back, I will ask them to go light on the sauce. There are so many wonderful flavors in the bowl, it really doesn't need any sauce so it's a pity to mask them with tahini sauce (which was quite good). Dinner for 2 for about $15. Huge portions, more than I could finish. And delish! We also got to taste their house made chocolate peanut butter hummus. Sorta like healthy Nutella. Too full to buy some tonight but we will back and take some home for a dessert.

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. Hummus&#39; menu
Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States. Hummus bowl with chicken, feta cheese, pita crisps, and much much more. Absolutely delicious.

GILJizlHOFpSaNwdUevlHA.text: SNAP! Yes, Hummus really IS as good as all the Yelp reviews say. WOW! I totally love this place! I like the style, the food, the atmosphere, everything! I'm an OG, so the music might be a little loud for me, but the food was really beyond awesome! SO fresh! Not a freezer in the joint (I took a peek in the kitchen and saw them fire grilling some meat too). You get to create your own dish. Hummus, spicy hummus, lamb, beef, chicken, all kinds of veggies and sauces as well. I'm going to have a blast exploring all the different flavor profiles here! I really dig the fountain drinks too. It's some brand I've seen a few times, but no high-fructose corn syrup in the drinks, which is fantastic IMHO. My wife loved Hummus too and she's pretty picky about Mediterranean food. I am too. Spot on. Well done, Hummus!

photos.caption: Photo of HUMMUS - Henderson, NV, United States

ybBSwgtplg6HvOCwHrSLRg.text: Came here on a whim when one of my favorite lunch spots was closed. So glad I did!! The food was so amazing I'm embarrassed to say I ate all of it!! I just couldn't stop. Imo was def enough for two to share though. Great vegan options. The roasted veggies were ! Top it all off with fantastic customer service. I walked in not knowing much and they provided great recommendations and explanations for me. Definitely must try post workout

_YPkxhW5G1KPq8KTrugAfQ.text: This restaurant is really worth 5 stars! I know I didn't believe it when I first saw it, but when I tried the food, wow, it's like a flavor explosion in your mouth! It was so good, that. Had to buy another bowl to go for my lunch tomorrow!   I saw it when I was driving to my workout class, Studio Remixx on Eastern, then I Yelped it, and I knew it was my post workout meal!   They spread the hummus (4 to choose from!) on the side of the bowl, add veggies, carbs (I didn't get it this time), protein and toppings. I love the crunchy toppings too. So many different toppings to choose from. I got the garlic sauce and it was delicious, I just wanted it in every bite. For $9 lunch, it was totally worth it. On the plus side it's healthy and delicious!!   I would drive from the other side of town to get Hummus Bowl again. Open one up near Rainbow and 215 please!

xmjSZZ8RgW0s26wFBhJijA.text: A-OK!  This place reminds me of a lighter take on a San Diego placed called the "Kebab Shop". Similar servings and it's a nice taste when I can't get home for my Mediterranean food fix.   Bowls and Pita prices are based on the protein you choose. Bowls come on a bed of greens. I really enjoyed my chicken bowl with garlic sauce (YUM), rice, tomatoes, and cucumber. The best surprise were the toasted chick peas and pita chips! Yum!  Their website is still a WIP so use Yelp's handy user photos of an idea of their menu!

Mv8V1G0Tlnf8HICBIIJPBA.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE my mom and I tried hummus for the first time today and we were so impressed! We were so excited to have found another awesome lunch spot! We are definitely foodies and like to try new things and we also love to cook so it's not always easy to find places that we are both so happy with but this is definitely a winner!

yISXOxTaaT9mgT2Svab_6Q.text: Super filling Mediterranean bowls at a good price. It's order process is much like Chipotle, very customizable. Choose either a wrap or bowl, type of hummus (sample to see which you like best), rice or lentils (or 50/50), and add toppings from a wide selection. I added falafel on top of the bowl which I sort of regretted (the falafel was kind of dry)  Atmosphere is a little boring and workers seemed tired when we were there. It was around 8PM and we were the only ones in the shop. There was an old black & white film being projected onto the wall at the time.   It was a nice stop on the way through Vegas to Bryce Canyon. Very vegan-friendly. Protein choices for non-vegans as well. Give it a shot

ce0Law_YogCxa6ML_q1dYQ.text: This was my first time to try this place as I heard it was spectacular, and that is correct. HUMMUS beats any. Mediterranean place here in Las Vegas and Henderson. Absolutely Amazing. I have never been to mediterranean place that will ever beat HUMMUS. The food is so fresh, great variety of choices and they don't charge you extra for more veggies. This is by far better the best restaurant I have ever been to it's way . Better than Parsley Mediterranean, Stefinios and more.   As soon as I walked in I was greeted with a friendly smile by Callie and Ashley who made me feel so welcomed. They made my bowl and smiled the whole time. As soon as I left they said thank you for coming. Amazing customer service.  I met the owner he was so polite very generous and has a great personality.   Come down to HUMMUS, trust me this place won't disappoint you at all. It's worth the drive to come here.  I will for sure be back and will highly recommended this place.

nhV85CxsjmeM3C7Q0_16Ag.text: I love this place! The food is fresh and so delicious. They offer so many choices for toppings. The garlic sauce is what we dipped our pita fries into. My son loves them and the falafels. If I could eat here everyday I would. Definitely recommend this place to anyone and everyone P.S. would love to have one in summerlin!

zoMTHVlJOl2PBgyI_PyPLw.text: Not only is this place new, but man it lives up to its 5 star yelp review!  Every experience here has been quick, tasty, and pleasant.  You can get a pita or a bowl. You then choose your hummus, grain (rice / lentil),  protein (chicken, veggies, lamb, steak, beef), then off to toppings and sauces. The garlic sauce is a little too much for me but the tzatziki sauce is wonderful. It's roughly $10 for a bowl.  The atmosphere is a little hipster, but cute. it's well lit, friendly atmosphere with music playing. It tends to get pretty busy around lunch hours so seating can be limited.

D6PDf1eVd8doWTOCN4tKIw.text: If you love Hummus and Mediterranean food then you must try this place!  The toppings for your hummus bowl are absolutely amazing!  Everything is home made!  Love this place!!!

dFmTFt8pAS3Rsu-xESZ4vw.text: Hummus is this cute spot tucked in Henderson. My friend suggested this spot after a post workout. It's a DEFINITE must go back! I wish they had more locations. They have this cute chalkboard menu and ambiance.   I just decided to go order by best suggestions. I ordered the spinach artichoke hummus bowl with kale, black rice, tomatoes, beets, feta cheese, cucumber, olives, toasted chickpeas, roasted veggies- varies by season. It was definitely AMAZING! Super fresh and well packed all for $10! I even ordered the pita fries.   I asked for multiple dressings on the side and the mint balsamic was my favorite.

u4rYvntwLUixHRtZGXTVpA.text: Highly recommend! Top-notch experience all the way around. The staff was very helpful and patient in explaining the process and plentiful menu options. The flavor of the food was phenomenal! The restaurant was clean and bright. This is a place you'll want to return to again and again!

ucgrOY9C7jnvLEDp2XkJ0A.text: Good bowls but garlic is way too strong. I would have liked more hummus in the bowl but will ask for more next time.  Good food
